trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Highland Park
There were no other sightings in Highland Park on or around August 18th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsA diamond-shaped object flew quickly straight across the sky leaving a bright blue streak behind it. It flew too high and too fast to be a plane. And I have never seen a bright blue streak left behind a plane.
Summary: diamond-shaped object flew straight across the sky leaving a blue streak behind it
